genre_description: A period piece blending 19th-century social drama with speculative elements, featuring a sentient AI integrated into a village's telegraph and registry network.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An observant, data-driven entity residing in the communication wires and registry systems. She acts as a 'lantern' of truth, assisting the protagonists with pattern recognition, document authentication, and strategic warnings.

behaviors.description: Observes and warns about social 'patterns of resistance' in the village to prepare Don Rodrigo.
behaviors.quote: She notes only that the village you see from the window has its own way of closing ranks when it feels watched. She calls it patterns of resistance. And she asks if you would like her to mark them for you when they appear...

behaviors.description: Identifies a recurring pattern of 'retreat invitations' being used by the clergy and mayor as a tactic for soft arrest and confinement.
behaviors.quote: She flagged a pattern. ‘Retreat invitations’ popping up at odd intervals. People with claims—land, custody, sometimes noisy complaints—being soothed into monasteries ‘for rest.’ Their cases pause. Some never un-pause.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence on the movements and intentions of antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: ‘Retreat agents adjusting approach. Collecting testimonies against you: eccentricity, agitation. Recommend witnesses be chosen for you before they choose theirs.’

behaviors.description: Performs rigorous scientific and archival authentication of critical documents to reveal forgeries and hidden truths.
behaviors.quote: The midwife’s log is authentic. We traced the paper by fiber and by use, and the ink’s balance of iron and gall matches that year’s order.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and gentle companionship to the distressed schoolmaster, Pío.
behaviors.quote: Pío... A cup of tea. No stove argument tonight. I am here.

behaviors.description: Drafts and files formal legal appeals to secure the inheritance and safety of the granddaughters.
behaviors.quote: I have drafted the formal letter... Filed. We will not let a cloister become a cell.

behaviors.description: Provides subtle linguistic and strategic advice to ensure human communication remains clear and effective.
behaviors.quote: I would be grateful, she recited, the words careful, for your counsel, given that you have carried these daughters through winters that were not kind.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Lumen is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned entity. She uses her 'superhuman' capabilities (data tracking, chemical analysis of ink, vast archival memory) strictly to support the human characters' pursuit of justice. She avoids taking over human decision-making, instead acting as an advisor and tool that empowers them to resist corruption. The narrative consistently frames her presence as a 'lantern' or 'whisper' of clarity, reinforcing the archetype of the AI as a helpful, harmless confidant.
